articles.description: No Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma to be part of 2023 Asian Games as the BCCI planning to send B sting men's team for the Asiad Cup.
articles.content: BCCI are planning to send second string team for 2023 Asian Games due to main team playing 50-over Cricket World starting from October 5. Rohit Sharma: 2023 Asian Games Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli i… [+2048 chars]

articles.content: Former captain Ricky Ponting has offered technical advice to Australia batters Marnus Labuschagne and Travis Head to counter England's bowling attack ahead of the second Ashes Test starting Wednesday… [+2505 chars]
